text: Robert Califf (born 1951) is an American cardiologist and politician. He was the Commissioner of Food and Drugs from 2022 until 2025 during the Joe Biden administration. He held the same job from September 2015 to January 2017 during the Barack Obama presidency. President Joe Biden renominated Califf to head the Food and Drug Administration on November 12, 2021. On February 15, 2022, the United States Senate confirmed his nomination by a 50-46 vote.Senate confirms Biden's nominee for FDA commissioner ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Commissioners of the Food and Drug Administration Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:Scientists from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert Califf
